data.title: My enchiladas are way better
data.text: I volunteer in a soup kitchen and we make enchiladas once a month from scratch. The ones here wer ok but I was looking for more authentic and this wasn't it.

data.title: Thumbs Way Up
data.text: This Mexican restaurant located in the west valley of Phoenix is outstanding, the was good Mexican food should be prepared.  Very friendly staff, great prices and clean. Diner style but don't let that stop you from a great Mexican meal

data.title: Always Up for Don Lencho's
data.text: Everyone in my family loves Don Lencho's. Even the one who never really liked Mexican food while growing up. My mother introduced me to the place, and eventually my family moved nearby. The menu is extensive, but we've each already settled upon our favorites. With every visit, I'm tempted to try something new... but I like my usuals so much I almost never try anything else. Servings are generous, service is quick and friendly, prices are affordable, seating is comfortable. There's not a whole lot to say, except that this is a great place that we all look forward to returning to.

data.title: Best Mexican food in the entire north valley.
data.text: We have been to Don Lencho's many times. Every dish is superb especially the deep fried whole fish, eyeballs and all and the menudo and the chips and salsa and, oh forget it just go. There is none better.

data.title: Thumbs way UP
data.text: 2nd visit to Don Lencho's.  Excellent I believe this Mexican restaurant is the most authentic this side of Mexico.  Service is great prices are very fair.  Today on Mothers Day I had the fish tacos, they were perfect.  Do yourself a favor and go to Don Lencho's for the best Mexican dining 😀😄

data.title: Hidden Gem In Peoria!
data.text:
We've lived in the area for many years but this is the first time we've had the opportunity to visit Don Lencho's.

Very conveniently located in the southern part of Peoria, close to the Loop 101.

We had shrimp enchiladas and a chicken chimi.  Both were excellent.  The house margaritas were great and the chips and salsa were delicious and plentiful.

We will be back soon!

data.title: THUMBS UP
data.text: Very authentic as if in Mexico Mexican Restaurant. Older diner style good decor.  Clean and excellent service.  Very fair prices.  Great menu selection with excellent quality meals that I have found in Mexico.  Will go back.  Even the ice tea is very GOOD!

data.title: Thoroughly enjoyed the food!!!
data.text: We had a very attentive server.  The chips and salsa were great...and we both enjoyed our meals immensely!   My husband had Carne Asada fries which he has never even seen at another restaurant and said they were fantastic. I had a chicken Chimichanga which was also extremely tasty.   Will definitely go back!

data.title: Thank you Trip  Advisor
data.text: Don Lenchos  is as good as promised  from other reviews.  One of the best Mexican Restaurants I have visited. Delicioso.

data.title: GOOD MEXICAN FOOD
data.text: This is a quiet neighborhood restaurant.  Not fancy, but good.  Their carne asada burrito is excellent.

data.title: Family
data.text: The food and service are always great  Although the facility is simple, you feel like you've gone to grandma's for dinner. Love this place!

data.title: Great authentic Mexican food.
data.text: This is a family owned and operated restaurant serving authentic Mexican fare.   They have some dishes you can't find anywhere.  Their fish dishes are fabulous.  The atmosphere is casual and the pricing is reasonable.  They serve a great marguareta.

data.title: a favorite mexican restaurant
data.text: cozy,comfortable & family freindly atmosphere. excelent food, great margaritas, great place to meet freinds for dinner.

data.title: Good Mexican food
data.text:
Companion and myself enjoyed a nice dinner at Don Lencho's. While the restaurant is on the noisy side because of the two television sets, the food is quite good. I enjoyed the pork dinner plate and my companion tried the chicken. Each plate came with the meat, accompanied by rice, beans, guacamole, lettuce, tomatoes and a basket of chips. The included tortillas can be ordered either flour or corn. My pork was very dry and overcooked, while the chicken plate was well cooked and was also covered with a nice pico de gallo. The guacamole is quite good as well.

The food is good quality, the menu is extensive and the service is very responsive.

Drinks include soda, tea, various beers and flavored margaritas. Refills are available for the soda and tea.

By 6pm the restaurant began to fill and an hour later it was totally full. Obviously this is a popular place enjoyed by the local community.

I do recommend this restaurant for its good quality Mexican food.

data.title: Great old school Mexican food.
data.text: This is a small family place with a few booths. Good Margaritas, prices are reasonable and the service is good.

data.title: Great experience
data.text: Went for the whole experience waiter was great very friendly , got the shrimp ceviche appetizer was very good the shrimp cocktail was great and for dessert the fried ice cream was amazing I would recommend this place 100%

data.title: The best ever!
data.text: Chose this restaurant based on Trip Advisor reviews are we were NOT disappointed! It was one of the best Mexican meals I've ever had! From melon margaritas to the best salsas to Fajitas to scrumptious shrimp enchiladas, we left stuffed and happy! Highly recommended!!!

data.title: Wonderful Mexican restaurant in Peoria, AZ
data.text:
This is our very favorite Mexican restaurant!!  The food is great, and the owners & wait staff are the best! We have recommended it to many people, and the reaction from them has been the same as ours, everyone goes back!!
Dave & Carol Cox

data.title: Caldos!!
data.text: I really like their soups here excellent flavor. not drowned in tomatoes or clamato. they have music on Friday nights not bad is ok if you like baja style Mexican food this place Is fairly good.

data.title: Good food
data.text: This is not a fancy place but it serves good solid mexican food. My parents go here all the time and they love it.
